\documentclass{article}

\definecolor{lightgray}{gray}{0.5}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}

\begin{document}

    
    \begin{verbatim}
 function [x, f, grad, s, a_star, n_objectives] = steepest_decent(f,...
     grad, x, alpha, obj, gradobj, plot_bool, s)

    s(:,end+1) = -grad(:,end);   % search direction
    mag = sqrt(grad(:,end)'*grad(:,end)); % magnitude

    % Set values to calc a_star
    [a_star, n_objectives] = parabolic_line_search(false, obj, x, f, s,...
        alpha, mag);

    x(:,end+1) = x(:,end) + a_star*s(:,end)/mag;
    f(:,end+1) = obj(x(:,end));
    grad(:,end+1) = gradobj(x(:,end));

    n_objectives = n_objectives + 1;

 end
\end{verbatim}



\end{document}
